CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Shipping_Method__c) = 'Next Day Air', "A", "B" ) & "-" & LEFT(Finance_Segment_Stamp__c, 1) & "_" & LEFT(TEXT(Went_to_Closing_Date__c),10) &"_"& CASE( LEN( IF( CONTAINS( CASE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode), "USD",TEXT(Amount), TEXT(Amount/Currency_Exchange_Rate__c) ), "." ), TRIM(LEFT( CASE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode), "USD",TEXT(Amount), TEXT(Amount/Currency_Exchange_Rate__c) ),FIND(".", CASE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode), "USD",TEXT(Amount), TEXT(Amount/Currency_Exchange_Rate__c) )) - 1 )), CASE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode), "USD",TEXT(Amount), TEXT(Amount/Currency_Exchange_Rate__c) ) ) ), 8,"A", 7,"B", 6,"C", 5,"D", 4,"E", 3,"F", 2,"G", 1,"H", 0,"I", "J" ) & IF(AND(TEXT(Went_to_Closing_Date__c) != "", NOW() - Went_to_Closing_Date__c >= 0.3333), IMAGE("/resource/circle_exclamation","IMG", 20,20), "" )
CustomField.label: Sort
